Physics, Mathematics, New Mexico State University, 1/1956   Description of Research  Summary Statement of Research Interests  Professor Daybell is interested in solar systems studies utilizing rocket and satellite borne photon spectrometers operating in the extreme ultraviolet. He and his students have developed a photoelectron spectrometer with two unique features for this work.   He also studies the long time term dependence of the EUV spectrum of the sun.    Faculty may update their profile by logging into the Dornsife portal from a computer on campus or off-campus via a VPN connection . Physics, Mathematics, New Mexico State University, 1/1956   Description of Research  Summary Statement of Research Interests  Professor Daybell is interested in solar systems studies utilizing rocket and satellite borne photon spectrometers operating in the extreme ultraviolet. He and his students have developed a photoelectron spectrometer with two unique features for this work.   He also studies the long time term dependence of the EUV spectrum of the sun.    Faculty may update their profile by logging into the Dornsife portal from a computer on campus or off-campus via a VPN connection .
